body:
*Sigh* 

As hot as that was... Nagisa's irrational fear of Ika was annoying enough in the show. It was just a gag, so I don't understand why it bothered me so much. Maybe because she proved time and time again that she was like... adorable and harmless? She's a worse invader than Keroro. And here, they literally fucked. She ate her out for fucks sake. And yet she still- 

Okay. Sorry. It's just porn. I shouldn't take my frustration about the show itself out on this innocent hentai doujin. The doujin itself was pretty  hot. Soooo... thumbs up.
